home.title: Get Rich!
home.description:
![](/assets/20180704_PrivatelyManaged_continuity_logo_1200x1200_rk 2 copy26 PXM.png)

### Anything, Anywhere, Anytime

Your office, your cloud server, your website showroom.

### I strive to be the best by doing and learning all things tech. You break. I fix.

This can be any computer or app. Perhaps you need a software developer, project manager or maybe just a friendly voice to help get you back to work.

I can work from anywhere. I love to protect people from the bad guys and I sleep well knowing that you trust me enough to refer your friends and colleagues.

**Thank You!**

\- Rich
